name: Karate Chop
desc: Machamp attacks in a straight line dealing damage to enemies hit.

name: Bulk Up
desc: Machamp buffs themselves for 3s increasing attack by 15%. Machamp is unstoppable for the duration and gains 40% attack speed and movement speed for 3s. Machamp’s next auto attack is boosted.

name: Dynamic Punch
desc: Machamp jumps to target location, briefly stunning enemies hit, slowing them by 40% for 3s, and dealing damage four times in quick succession to the landing radius. Machamp’s Atk is increased by 15% and gains bonus movement speed for 6s when using Dynamic Punch.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Further increases movement speed and Atk bonus by 5%.

name: Submission
desc: Machamp becomes unstoppable and gains 50% increased movement speed for 5s or until the next auto attack. Machamp’s next auto attack during submission is enhanced, hitting twice and slamming the target down behind Machamp. If this attack hits, Machamp also gains 5% increased Critical-Hit Rate and 50% Attack Speed for 3s.

fields.title: Level 11
fields.value: Further increases Critical-Hit Rate by 5% and Attack Speed by 10%.

name: Close Combat
desc: Machamp unleashes a barrage of blows in a targeted direction, hitting multiple times and finishing with a single large strike. Machamp is unstoppable for the duration and can move while using close combat.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Deals 25% additional damage if the target is affected by a status condition.

name: Cross Chop
desc: Machamp dashes forward dealing damage to enemies hit. Cross chop increases Critical-Hit Rate by 5% for 3s and can critically strike.

fields.title: Level 13
fields.value: Machamp’s auto attacks increases Atk by 2, permanently stacking up to 40 times.

name: Barrage Blow
desc: Increases Machamp's movement speed, Attack by 30%, Defense by 200, and Sp. Defense by 200 for 10s. If used again, unleash a combo attack, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and shoving them. The final blow deals double the damage of the previous hits.
